title: How Jesus' Resurrection Changes the World in a Slow, Sacrificial, Memetic Way
description:
We all think we know what will save the world, and we are wrong. We think some combination of power and reason will bring us all to the utopia we imagine we deserve, and it never happens. Right in the middle of the story we sleepwalk into the resurrection of the Son of Man. This has been reliably changing the world for 2000 years. Do we wish to try it. 

Dominion by Tom Holland https://amzn.to/3mg1Ix7
